name: Sniped!
description:
This Is A Game Where You Have To Click On The Red Circles As Fast As You Can. if You Want You Can Post Your Timings In The Comments and also note that I will update the game even further if it reaches 30 downloads

also if you download the ZIP file it shows that it is dangerous but don't worry it is not dangerous or virus just click on ^ and click on keep and you can download it with no worries

Peace!
